title.rendered: Build a Career at the Esplanade

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

We are looking for new members of the Esplanade team!

 

Fulfil your potential and build a career in an attractive and dynamic international environment.

Our doors are open to all those willing to go a step further and strive for excellence, to those who are dedicated and bring a positive attitude towards their work and colleagues, and for whom client satisfaction comes first.

View job vacancies and contact us:

 

English and Croatian Ad:

  • Director of Food & Beverage

Croatian Ad:

  • Room attendant
  • Florist
  • Concierge
  • Maintenance technician
  • Kitchen assistant – dishwasher area
  • Waiter at Esplanade Bar
  • PR & Marketing Associate & Digital Specialist
  • Reservations Department Agent

 

Please send your resumes to: posao@esplanade.hr

·

Zagreb’s Esplanade Hotel was built in 1925 for passengers of the famous Orient Express. Over the years, this, on many levels unique, hotel has established itself as a leader in tourism trends and innovations, while receiving a number of prestigious awards and recognitions for its distinctive service, gastronomy, and design. An icon of style and luxury, the Lady of Zagreb, as the hotel is fondly called, has profiled herself into a kind of institution in the hotel industry in Croatia and the region. Even today, the hotel is the centre of the city’s social life, its special charm and energy irresistibly attracting guests and celebrities from all over the world. The Esplanade Hotel has helped develop generations of workers in tourism, and their love and dedication have contributed to the impeccable image and success of the hotel on the local and international tourist scene. 

 

Published: 23 February 2023

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
